alert.note: Alert for Iroquois (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 07 at 1:28AM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Iroquois County through 200 AM CDT... At 128 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Ashkum, or near Clifton, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Clifton, Chebanse, Ashkum, Martinton, Danforth, Beaverville, Donovan and Papineau. Including the following interstate... I-57 between mile markers 288 and 301. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
